Trade/Device Name(s): Medisign MM1000 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Medisign MM1100 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Medisign MM1200 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Medisign MM1000 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Medisign MM1100 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Medisign MM1200 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Submitter Information: Tianjin Empecs Medical Device Co., Ltd.
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Medisign MM1000 Multi Blood Glucose Meter
Medisign MM1100 Multi Blood Glucose Meter
Medisign MM1200 Multi Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Medisign MM1000, MM1100, MM1200, and Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems and Glucose Control Solutions for quantitative blood glucose measurement using amperometric detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood from fingertip, palm, and forearm; home self-testing for single-patient use or professional healthcare settings for multiple-patient testing (Multi models); not for diagnosis or screening for diabetes or for neonatal use.
